page.title: 20 Supernatural
page.content:
{Grey Lady The grey lady was said to have been a nun at the church of Pillerton Priors. When the church was burnt down by King Rupert on his way to the battle of Edge Hill the nun was killed and is said to haunt the churchyard.People who live near have claimed to have seen her.
{D Block 03900126 Compiled at Butlers Marston C.E School by the Junior Class in particular, Katie Gledhill,Tracey Coggan,Claire Hart,Christopher Darlow,Christopher Chick and their teacher Mrs M.J.Watkin. Photographs by Miss J.Henry.
